page.title: 18HOME ENTERTAINMEMT
page.content: Most people in their homes have many electrical appliances which provide entertainment. The most popular are, a television set, a record or cassette player, and a computer. Some people have got personal stereos. Some people like reading books. Other people like making music. Board games like chess provide entertainment and other games like monopoly. {DISTANT ENTERTAINMENT:} In towns and cities cinemas show films at certain times and some films are for any age, but sometimes they are for the over 15's. There are also theatres where performances of plays and musical shows are held live. There are also pop song concerts. These take place in the city of Bristol and the town of Weston-Super-Mare.
